animeDescription: Perorich is a dog-detective which his own private agency in Tokyo. He returns to Toyama City for a case but in doing so, explores the and "finds" the charm of the prefecture. The anime is a commissioned project by Toyama City in order to promote tourism.
animeRelated: ['Other: Kitty-chan wo Sagase! Toyama-shi Stamp Rally', 'Side story: Taka no Tsume-dan, Toyama']
